article_title: HealthSource RI call center firm Optum to lay off 60 employees in April
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: The notification comes just days before the state is expected to announce which company will be named to serve as the call center operator when Optum's contract expires March 31.
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
